channel.title: Quest help

item.title: Quest help
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Well atleast make an effort. -.-

case 654: if(q1 == 0) { Sendmessage("he don't wana talk."); } else if (q1 == 1); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo),4902); sendFrame126("",4903); sendFrame126("I see, yer want to lern 'bout ze lost city?",4904); sendFrame126("",4905);sendFrame126("",4906); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo,4901); sendFrame164(4900); sendMessage("The gnome fills you in on the story, your quest log has been updated."); NpcDialogueSend=true; break;

Read full topic

item.title: Quest help
item.dc:creator: @tomjrmkay tomjrmkay
item.description:
@tomjrmkay wrote:

case 654: if(q1 == 0) [
Sendmessage(“he don’t wana talk.”);
] else if(q1 == 1);sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo),4902);sendFrame126("",4903);sendFrame126(“I see, yer want to lern 'bout ze lost city?”,4904);sendFrame126("",4905);sendFrame126("",4906);sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo,4901);sendFrame164(4900);sendMessage(“The gnome fills you in on the story, your quest log has been updated.”);NpcDialogueSend=true;break;

item.title: Quest help
item.dc:creator: @sickamore sickamore
item.description:
@sickamore wrote:

i want it so that when you click on the gnome and you havent started the quest it does this:

sendMessage("The gnome does not want to talk to you.");

this is what i have :

case 654: if(q1 == 1); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo),4902); sendFrame126("",4903); sendFrame126("I see, yer want to lern 'bout ze lost city?",4904); sendFrame126("",4905); sendFrame126("",4906); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo,4901); sendFrame164(4900); sendMessage("The gnome fills you in on the story, your quest log has been updated."); NpcDialogueSend=true; break;
